        public Guard generateGuard(Position pos,
                           java.lang.String guardType)

        pos - the position of the guard
        guardType - the personality of the guard (rookie, drunken or suspicious)
        Returns:

      • moveGuard

        public void moveGuard()
        Performs a movement of the guard, also updating its internal values.

      • checkGuard

        public boolean checkGuard()
        Checks if the guard is capable of harming the hero, thus ending the game. Not only checks if they're on consecutive positions, but also makes sure that the guard is not asleep.
        Returns:
        a boolean value indicating if the game is over or not.

      • checkCell

        public boolean checkCell(Position pos,
                         Entity entity)
        Checks if the cell the hero is trying to move is a valid cell.To be valid it needs to be a free cell (' '). It also checks if the hero is moving to the lever or to an open door updating the game status accordingly.
        Specified by:
        checkCell in class Level
        Returns:
        a boolean value indicating if the cell is valid or not.

      • update

        public void update(Position pos,
                   Entity entity)
        Updates the position of a certain character.
        Specified by:
        update in class Level
        Parameters:
        pos - the position the character is moving.
        entity - the character to be updated.

      • moveEnemy

        public void moveEnemy()
        Moves the enemy in this level (Guard).
        Specified by:
        moveEnemy in class Level

      • checkEnemy

        public boolean checkEnemy()
        Calls functions checkGuard() to see if the guard is capable of harming the hero.
        Specified by:
        checkEnemy in class Level
        Returns:
        a boolean value indicating if the guard harmed the hero or not.

      • saveToFile

        Parameters:

      • readFromFile

        public static Dungeon readFromFile(java.io.File file)
        Reads from a file and creates a new Dungeon level. Has the ability to create the level at any state: the beginning, after the hero has moved, before/after the lever has been activated.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be read
        Returns:
        a new Dungeon level
